pages.title: Status LED breathing
pages.description: Breathing (slowly fading in an out) is typically a normal operating mode. The color indicates which connectivity mode the device is in.

buttons.title: Breathing cyan (light blue, normal operating mode)
Breathing green (network connected, no cloud)
Breathing magenta (red and blue at the same time, safe mode)
